comments.body:
Please add [`entry_points`](http://conda.pydata.org/docs/building/meta-yaml.html#python-entry-points).

``` yaml
  entry_points:
    - unidecode = unidecode.util:main
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt
  entry_points:
    - unidecode = unidecode.util:main
